attributes.action: Government funding for Funding for life saving organisations like Air Ambulance and the RNLI
attributes.additional_details:
We need to support the Air Ambulance and the RNLI (The Royal National Lifeboat Institution).

The services that these teams/people provide are Not funded by the government or NHS and they rely on charity donations from the public and this should not be so.

What would you do if you or your child needed to get to hospital quick and needed the air ambulance services as the regular ambulance was going to be 15-30 minutes away?

What would you do if you or your child fell into the sea and the RNLI where not there?

These are services that are always required by local people as well as not local people and are vital to anyone whom needs their assistance in a life threatening situation.

Having these services funded in some way by the government would allow the staffs that are there to save lives, to be better equipped and staffed and above all ready to help YOU when you need them most.
